Detailed Description

Header file for the fast NFFT-based summation algorithm.

reference: M. Fenn, G. Steidl, Fast NFFT based summation of radial functions. Sampl. Theory Signal Image Process., 3, 1-28, 2004.

Author:
Markus Fenn
